column1: Reminds me of the saying: “the lady doth protest too much”... it’s no longer “coronavirus”, it’s the “Chinese virus” of which, when put thru the Orwellian language computer probably means it’s the “American CIA, warmongering biological warfare sponsored project virus”

Reminds me of the saying: “the lady doth protest too much”... it’s no longer “coronavirus”, it’s the “Chinese virus” of which, when put thru the Orwellian language computer probably means it’s the “American CIA, warmongering biological warfare sponsored project virus”
